name: Create Instagram posts from an Airtable Content Calendar
description: When you add information to the Airtable Content Calendar, this automation will retrieve the content for the current day, post it on Instagram automatically and update the status on the table. It uses this [Airtable template.](https://airtable.com/shr1KexVpjgxj37vr/tblvVre8PFmhBGrEa/viwCSvpS7UlzgrJFD?blocks=hide)
